Name: bone resorption disease
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that results in an abnormal decrease of bone density or mass.

Name: fibrous dysplasia
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that results_in the destruction of normal bone and replacing it with fibrous bone tissue.

Name: osteomalacia
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that has_material_basis_in a vitamin D deficiency which results_in softening located_in bone.

Name: obsolete vitamin D deficiency
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that has_material_basis_in a vitamin D deficiency which results_in softening located_in bone.

Name: rickets
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that has_material_basis_in impaired mineralization or calcification of bones before epiphyseal closure due to deficiency or impaired metabolism of vitamin D

Name: obsolete renal aminoaciduria
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that has_material_basis_in impaired mineralization or calcification of bones before epiphyseal closure due to deficiency or impaired metabolism of vitamin D

Name: hyperostosis
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that results in an abnormal growth of located in bone.

Name: osteosclerosis
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that results_in abnormal elevated bone density or mass.

Name: obsolete rheumatism
Definition: A bone remodeling disease that results_in abnormal elevated bone density or mass.
